page.title: 04ATTITUDES OF BRANSTON PEOPLE
page.content: Branston used to be a small village but now more housing estates have been erected and there are over 700 more people than there used to be 10 years ago. Some people have lived here all their lives. The rest moved here because of jobs. People felt very strongly about the size of our village and that it should be developed no further. Several said there was enough recreation for adults but not enough for children. Branston seems a good retirement area. The people who knew anything about Branston schools said they were O.K. (See education). The aircraft noise from Waddington is very unpopular, but long term residents are used to it. Most people said they liked Branston. They thought it was a good village to live in.
